articles.title: Dow Jones Today: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Fall as Chipmakers, Airlines and Tesla Tumble - Investopedia
articles.description: The Nasdaq Composite and S&P 500 fell as shares of big tech companies and airlines tumbled, while stocks in other sectors that stand to benefit from lower interest rates rose on growing expectations that the Federal Reserve could soon cut its benchmark rate.
